page.title: 17WELLBURY HOUSE
page.content: A weekday for the boys starts at 8.00 and ends with bed at 10.00pm.School, which is on the premises,is from 9.15 to 4.15pm.In the evening creative and recreational activities are arranged. Boys visit their homes or other relatives at varying intervals. Their progress is reviewed with the Social Worker,themselves and parents at regular intervals. In the extensive grounds there is a heated open-air swimming pool,football pitch,adventure playground and gym,as well as 3 bungalows for staff.A new house is being built for the Principal In the main house nine of the staff have rooms,the rest live within 12 miles.In the groups two or three boys usually share a room.Each group has a kitchenette,television room and a room for indoor games,e.g. pool and darts.
